InitiateTopicclass

Details

An "initiate" topic entry. This is a rather different kind of topic entry from the ones we've defined so far; an initiate topic is for cases where the NPC itself wants to initiate a conversation in response to something in the environment. One way to use initiate topics is to use the current location as the topic key. This lets the NPC say something appropriate to the current room, and can be coded simply as actor.initiateTopic(location); `class `**`InitiateTopic`**` :   `[`ThingMatchTopic`](../object/ThingMatchTopic.html)
